relation: You never have to worry about your safety on campus. There are several university polices patrolling campus. And there are several blue boxes throughout campus you can press when you are having problems and police will come over the intercom or come to where you are.

There are several fraternities and sororities on campus. You have to find one that fits your personalities. Those who become Greek most of them our legacies meaning one of their parents was in that fraternity or sorority.
There are several activities that goes on campus such as fraternity and sorority parties. Of course there's the baseball, football and basketball games.
There are several eating places on campus if you get tired of the cafeteria food. They have Popeyes, Burger King, Subway and the list goes on.
Dorm Life was exciting. Just the ideal of being on your own a little. Living in the dorm you meet new people and develop friendships.
Study!!! Study!!! Study!!! If you are having problems there are tutors for almost every subject.

Southeastern Louisiana University is a wonderful school to attend. The university offers a lot of opportunities for students. Not to mention the wonderful instructors who are there to help the students.
pageTitle: Southeastern Louisiana University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {117306=Southeastern is an amazing school. The campus is not too big so most of your classes are close together. The student teacher ratio is 1:30., 57832=southeastern is an accredited university with over 90 degree programs. the largest teacher-student ratio is less than 1 : 100. the ratio reaches it's maximum mainly in entry level courses that are required for all students. selu offers numerous scholarships to qualifying students, while tuition/fees are relatively reasonable. nearby universities (such as lsu) with the same level of accreditation offer a staggeringly higher teacher-student ratio, approaching levels of 1 : 1000, which severely limits the chances of receiving one-on-one attention from one's course instructor. selu offers multiple scholarships for every one that can definitely be attained by the average student, whereas lsu offers scholarships mainly only to the highest-ranking students. essentially, southeastern offers more opportunities, less rigorous course work, and a smaller cost of attendance than all neighboring universities with equivalent levels of accreditation. southeastern defines the phrase bang for the buck., 336413=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 316761=Follow deadlines, they will sneak up on you and if you miss it; too late! 8:00 A.M classes aren't that bad. Always try to stay on your teacher's good side.}
textBeforeTable: 07/09/2009 Reviewer is Accepted here and planning to attend soon. Reviewer has been to campus. 17 out of 18 people found this review useful. 1 of 73 Blake from Mermentau, LA Check out reviews left by other students or leave your own review. textAfterTable: Categories Comments Tips for prospective students Go and visit the beautiful campus! Look and see if they have anything to offer you. Make new friends. Live, laugh, and learn! Login to rate or flag the reviews william from Saint Amant, LA 05/18/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 6 out of 7 people found this review useful. 3 of 73 Categories Comments Great for these types of students One of the best nursing schools in nation Bang for the buck rent text books so you save money by not paying hundreds or even a thousand dollars for books Am enjoying being here Go greek, this school offers so much more than class. They offer free gym, pool, tennis courts, sand volleyball court. Can play any sport in intramural. Great greek life Am learning a lot
